text: Harshita Tomar is an Indian sailor. She won the bronze medal at 2018 Asian Games in women's Open Laser 4.7. She received a prize money of 50 lakhs from M.P. government. ==References== Category:Indian female sailors (sport) Category:Living people Category:Asian Games medalists in sailing Category:Sailors at the 2018 Asian Games Category:2002 births Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for India Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Harshita Tomar
